title: Award-Winning Gourmet Food and Wine Escape in Victoria's Grampians
description: A gourmet lovers’ paradise awaits in Victoria's iconic Grampians with two nights at the award-winning Royal Mail Hotel - home to Wickens, one of regional Victoria’s most renowned degustation experiences. Embark on a gourmet journey at Wickens with an exclusive 15% off food included in your escape. You'll also enjoy daily à la carte breakfast, a complimentary bottle of wine, cellar tour of a world-leading wine collection, complimentary tour of Australia’s largest kitchen garden and a late 1pm checkout.

title: Royal Mail - Award-Winning Gourmet Food and Wine Escape
description: A gourmet lovers’ paradise awaits in Victoria's iconic Grampians with two nights at the award-winning Royal Mail Hotel - home to one of regional Victoria’s most well-renowned degustation experiences. Enjoy daily à la carte breakfasts, a complimentary bottle of wine, cellar tour of a world-leading wine collection, complimentary tour of Australia’s largest kitchen garden, late 1pm checkout and more.
